name: Magmar
flavorText:
Its body always
burns with an
orange glow that enables it to
hide perfectly
among flames.

previous.name: Electabuzz
previous.flavorText:
Normally found
near power plants,
they can wander away and cause
major blackouts
in cities.

next.name: Pinsir
next.flavorText:
If it fails to
crush the victim
in its pincers, it will swing it
around and toss
it hard.

pokemon.name: Magby
pokemon.flavorText:
Each and every
time it inhales
and exhales, hot embers dribble out
of its mouth and
nostrils.

pokemon.name: Magmar
pokemon.flavorText:
Its body always
burns with an
orange glow that enables it to
hide perfectly
among flames.

pokemon.name: Magmortar
pokemon.flavorText:
It blasts fireballs of over 3,600
degrees F from the ends of its
arms. It lives in volcanic craters.
